title: Only 4 Mystery Gifts a day
body:
According to: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ
We are supposed to be able to receive 10 mystery gifts a day and yet I can only gift myself 4. Even a friend (who has gifted me other items over the past week) was unable to gift me anything more....

Can someone please confirm if we are limited to 4 mystery skins a day regardless of the source or is this a bug?

Further more, why is mystery gifting from a friend also limited by the same restriction?

replies.body:
Hey there,

>Further more, why is mystery gifting from a friend also limited by the same restriction?

Here are the restrictions on mystery gifting

* **You can only send up to 10 gifts every 24 hours.**
* **You can only receive up to 10 gifts every 24 hours.**

Keep in mind these restrictions do not reset at midnight, they're timed from 24 hours after each purchase
>After you reach your limit, you're able to purchase an 11th mystery gift 24 hours after your first purchase, a 12th mystery gift 24 hours after your second purchase, and so on. The limit does not reset at midnight.

Hope this helps.
